ServerGroup.Name: Survive Enter At Your Own Risk

Server.Name: Survive Enter At Your Own Risk A18.4
Server.Description:
For Alpha 18.4
Like from a17... Survival enter at your own risk
The Title says it all If you like a challenge or play permdeath max difficutly I would advise you To do Just that !
New building and decoration blocks Things that go bump in the night that you've never seen before in 7 days has arrived
It is highly Advisable to go into Dislong tower or pharmacy building at early game as you will be safe there
if you have any issues contact me at my email army.bratt44@gmail.com or find me on twitch at unforgiven774
I am Constantly updating the mod so stay tuned for more updates
